tool.name: task
tool.description:
Execute a task using a specialized sub-agent. Sub-agents are defined by markdown files in the prompt/agents/ directory.
Each sub-agent has specific capabilities and instructions for handling particular types of tasks (e.g., code review, vulnerability testing, etc.)
Use 'list_agents' to see available sub-agent types.

parameters.parameter: The task prompt describing what the agent should do
The type of specialized agent to use (e.g., 'code_audit', 'vuln_review')
A short (3-5 words) description of the task

tool.name: list_agents
tool.description: List all available sub-agents that can be used with the 'task' tool. Returns the name and description of each available agent.

returns.field: List of agent objects with name, description, path
